body:
I have seen the following crash twice at Lyft:
```
#0  0x0000562c8852dcda in __unlink_nodes (__f=0x562c8cc6fa40, __l=0x562c8cc6fa40) at /opt/llvm/bin/../include/c++/v1/list:711
#0  0x0000562c8852dcda in __unlink_nodes (__f=0x562c8cc6fa40, __l=0x562c8cc6fa40) at /opt/llvm/bin/../include/c++/v1/list:711
#1  erase (this=0x562c8a7aefa8, __p=...) at /opt/llvm/bin/../include/c++/v1/list:1812
#2  removeFromList (this=0x562c8f0dc708, list=...) at bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/external/envoy/source/common/common/_virtual_includes/linked_object/common/common/linked_object.h:73
#3  Envoy::Router::Filter::onUpstreamReset (this=0x562c8a7aef20, reset_reason=Envoy::Http::RemoteReset, transport_failure_reason=..., upstream_request=...) at external/envoy/source/common/router/router.cc:1106
#4  0x0000562c885369e8 in Envoy::Router::UpstreamRequest::onResetStream (this=0x562c8f0dc700, reason=Envoy::Http::RemoteReset, transport_failure_reason=...) at external/envoy/source/common/router/upstream_request.cc:252
#5  0x0000562c885c124f in runResetCallbacks (this=<optimized out>, reason=Envoy::Http::RemoteReset) at bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/external/envoy/source/common/http/_virtual_includes/codec_helper_lib/common/http/codec_helper.h:49
#6  Envoy::Http::Http2::ConnectionImpl::onStreamClose (this=<optimized out>, stream_id=<optimized out>, error_code=<optimized out>) at external/envoy/source/common/http/http2/codec_impl.cc:807
#7  0x0000562c885c5d6c in operator() (this=<optimized out>, stream_id=640, error_code=20, user_data=0x562c89747100) at external/envoy/source/common/http/http2/codec_impl.cc:1052
#8  Envoy::Http::Http2::ConnectionImpl::Http2Callbacks::Http2Callbacks()::$_13::__invoke(nghttp2_session*, int, unsigned int, void*) (stream_id=640, error_code=20, user_data=0x562c89747100) at external/envoy/source/common/http/http2/codec_impl.cc:1051
#9  0x0000562c88787637 in nghttp2_session_close_stream (session=0x562c8caa2800, stream_id=3325, error_code=0) at /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e500e327e6981ab742dbacbb6723d21d/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/305/execroot/envoy_lyft/external/com_github_nghttp2_nghttp2/lib/nghttp2_session.c:1190
#10 0x0000562c8878a341 in nghttp2_session_on_rst_stream_received (session=0x562c8caa2800, frame=0x562c8caa29a0) at /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e500e327e6981ab742dbacbb6723d21d/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/305/execroot/envoy_lyft/external/com_github_nghttp2_nghttp2/lib/nghttp2_session.c:4170
#11 0x0000562c8878d5ca in session_process_rst_stream_frame (session=0x562c8caa2800) at /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e500e327e6981ab742dbacbb6723d21d/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/305/execroot/envoy_lyft/external/com_github_nghttp2_nghttp2/lib/nghttp2_session.c:4184
#12 nghttp2_session_mem_recv (session=<optimized out>, in=0x562c8c6de0a0 "-on: 5xx\r\nx-envoy-retry-grpc-on: unavailable,cancelled,deadline-exceeded,resource-exhausted\r\nx-envoy-max-retries: 1\r\nx-envoy-upstream-rq-timeout-ms: 8000\r\nx-envoy-upstream-rq-per-try-timeout-ms: 8000\r"..., inlen=<optimized out>) at /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e500e327e6981ab742dbacbb6723d21d/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/305/execroot/envoy_lyft/external/com_github_nghttp2_nghttp2/lib/nghttp2_session.c:5994
#13 0x0000562c885bf2fc in Envoy::Http::Http2::ConnectionImpl::dispatch (this=0x562c8cb07c90, data=...) at external/envoy/source/common/http/http2/codec_impl.cc:475
#14 0x0000562c8850fc98 in Envoy::Http::CodecClient::onData (this=0x562c8c63fef0, data=...) at external/envoy/source/common/http/codec_client.cc:125
#15 0x0000562c88510aad in Envoy::Http::CodecClient::CodecReadFilter::onData (this=<optimized out>, data=...) at bazel-out/k8-opt/bin/external/envoy/source/common/http/_virtual_includes/codec_client_lib/common/http/codec_client.h:174
#16 0x0000562c884132d3 in Envoy::Network::FilterManagerImpl::onContinueReading (this=0x562c8f953ff8, filter=<optimized out>, buffer_source=...) at external/envoy/source/common/network/filter_manager_impl.cc:66
#17 0x0000562c8840f7f3 in onRead (this=0x562c8f953f80, read_buffer_size=<optimized out>) at external/envoy/source/common/network/connection_impl.cc:297
#18 Envoy::Network::ConnectionImpl::onReadReady (this=0x562c8f953f80) at external/envoy/source/common/network/connection_impl.cc:552
#19 0x0000562c8840ea50 in Envoy::Network::ConnectionImpl::onFileEvent (this=0x562c8f953f80, events=<optimized out>) at external/envoy/source/common/network/connection_impl.cc:526
#20 0x0000562c884094a6 in operator() (this=0x94, __args=<unknown type in /usr/sbin/envoy, CU 0xc1937a0, DIE 0xc208e83>) at /opt/llvm/bin/../include/c++/v1/functional:1860
#21 operator() (this=0x94, __arg=3) at /opt/llvm/bin/../include/c++/v1/functional:2419
#22 operator() (this=<optimized out>, what=<optimized out>, arg=<optimized out>) at external/envoy/source/common/event/file_event_impl.cc:69
#23 Envoy::Event::FileEventImpl::assignEvents(unsigned int, event_base*)::$_0::__invoke(int, short, void*) (what=<optimized out>, arg=0x14) at external/envoy/source/common/event/file_event_impl.cc:50
#24 0x0000562c8877dd9b in event_persist_closure (base=0x562c89f2edc0, ev=<optimized out>) at /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e500e327e6981ab742dbacbb6723d21d/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/586/execroot/envoy_lyft/external/com_github_libevent_libevent/event.c:1645
#25 event_process_active_single_queue (base=0x562c89f2edc0, activeq=0x562c8a15a3a0, max_to_process=2147483647, endtime=0x0) at /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e500e327e6981ab742dbacbb6723d21d/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/586/execroot/envoy_lyft/external/com_github_libevent_libevent/event.c:1704
#26 0x0000562c8877c62e in event_process_active (base=0x562c89f2edc0) at /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e500e327e6981ab742dbacbb6723d21d/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/586/execroot/envoy_lyft/external/com_github_libevent_libevent/event.c:1808
#27 event_base_loop (base=0x562c89f2edc0, flags=<optimized out>) at /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e500e327e6981ab742dbacbb6723d21d/sandbox/processwrapper-sandbox/586/execroot/envoy_lyft/external/com_github_libevent_libevent/event.c:2047
#28 0x0000562c883fca31 in Envoy::Server::WorkerImpl::threadRoutine (this=0x562c8a0c9b30, guard_dog=...) at external/envoy/source/server/worker_impl.cc:119
#29 0x0000562c8882f143 in operator() (this=<optimized out>) at /opt/llvm/bin/../include/c++/v1/functional:1860
#30 operator() (this=<optimized out>) at /opt/llvm/bin/../include/c++/v1/functional:2419
#31 operator() (this=<optimized out>, arg=<optimized out>) at external/envo
```

I believe this was introduced in the following diff: https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/compare/59b7e037a8702e1b5da477f1ec5f98138d8723cf...3750bc9342a5c5f35a44a1c4d91195265e6e53cc

Most likely candidate is https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/commit/37e9a52318ac4f6806298aa5b7d7339853f6e9b7. cc @ggreenway 

Possibly also https://github.com/envoyproxy/envoy/commit/38fb3903ef8b01fa96bc943ad23ac7187f857a48. cc @alyssawilk 

Nothing else looks suspicious but I didn't check very carefully. I can take a look at a core dump next week. cc @LisaLudique @tonya11en
title: crash regression during upstream retry
